name: UI/UX Design and Development- Offers and Discount
description: Developed a crowd-sourced website that focuses on the UI design. The website stores and updates all entries made by the users, and automatically deletes expired entries.
description2: Used Google Cloud Services to host the website, and phpMyAdmin (MySQL) for database services.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, MySQL and Apache Tomcat, Google Cloud Services, PHP

name: Website Development: Portfolio Website
description: Developed a website from scratch as an independent project.
description2: The website demonstrates various Web Development technologies, and is based on AngularJS framework.
technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AngularJS, Bootstrap, Github, npm

name: E-commerce Project: Favor Bag
description: Developed E-commerce based web application and hosted the same using Amazon Web Services.
description2: Desktop and mobile (android) compatible interface. Consumer data entry and retrieval.
technologies: AWS, MySQL, PHP, Bootstrap, JavaScript, Open SSH/Putty

name: Node.js Project: Twitter Live Tweets App
description: Developer node.js app using nmp library called 'Twit'. Used Express.js to interact with Twitter API.
description2: The app takes keywords as query and fetches latest tweets containing the keyword. Used Pug+Bootstrap for front-end.
technologies: Node.js, Express.js, npm, Twitter API, Pug/Jade, Bootstrap, Heroku

name: AngularJS Project: CRUD application using Firebase
description: Developed a simple CRUD application using Angular JS, Firebase API and AngularFire. Link to the App provided below.
description2: The app maintains a dynamic record of entries, uses Firebase database to update and display records in real-time.
technologies: HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, AngularJS, Foundation, Firebase API, AngularFire

name: Developed and deployed nodes on ‘Integration Flow Designer’
description: An in-house software for wiring together hardware devices, API and online services in new and interesting ways.
description2: Developed a custom node for ‘Couch DB’ working on Node JS, JavaScript and HTML

name: Near-Proximity: Product
description: Developed a product software that collected data through a sensor device and computed statistical reports.
description2: Used a message-broker system that sent computed data to a visualization tool website (Grafana) where the resultant data is displayed as a graphical representation.
technologies: Python, BLE Beacon, Raspberry Pie, Node-Red, Grafana
